*Generated by Head of Sales & Marketing - Jan 2026*

## 1. Brand & Value Proposition

**Product:** ComplyFlow  
**Tagline:** Compliance Without the Complexity.  
**Core Promise:** Stay CQC-Ready, 24/7. Replace chaos with confidence.

### The "Why"
Care home managers are drowning in paperwork, terrified of "Inadequate" ratings, and stressed about Home Office sponsorship compliance. ComplyFlow is the AI-powered shield that protects their license and their peace of mind.

## 5. Feature Deep Dives (For Website/Brochures)

### Feature: AI Gap Analyzer
**Headline:** An Ex-Inspector in Your Pocket.
**Body:** Imagine having a CQC compliance expert reviewing your work 24/7. Our AI scans your existing policies against the latest CQC regulations and Key Lines of Enquiry (KLOEs). It highlights exactly what's missing, suggests text to fix it, and ensures you're always audit-ready.

### Feature: SponsorGuardian
**Headline:** Never Miss a Visa Deadline.
**Body:** Managing overseas talent is complex. SponsorGuardian simplifies it. Track visa expiry dates, automate right-to-work reminders, and store essential documents in one secure, GDPR-compliant vault. Avoid fines and keep your team focused on care, not admin.
